metadata.description:
I love to write songs but I also enjoy challenging myself with other types of writing like poetry, reflective journaling, or fictional stories. 


This song was created in a studio session that I actually brought my personal journal to, I normally don’t take it with me but I felt like I needed it that day. When I got to my good friend Kennys studio, I started looking through my recent journal entries. I had been reflecting on how much energy I give to low vibrational conversations, people and things. We just started having an open dialogue about what it means to give away too much of your own energy, how distracting low vibrational conversations can be and most importantly how to protect your peace.


 I think what makes this song special is that it started as a conversation with a friend and then a fun freestyle that we morphed into a song. We did all of the recording in about an hour with all the windows open on a perfect summer day, it was just before golden hour and everything just flowed.  I love listening back to this song and reflecting on that conversation, when I listen back I can almost the feel warm air, the energy we had that day and the smell of the studio incense.

lyrics.text:
Think that I've been way to sweet to people that just 

Deserve me, run in circles acting foolish 

Starts to make my vision blurry, but don't get me the wrong way

I know people misbehave

Think my kindness is my weakness your mistake

Never want to get involved in simple minded things

All unnecessary problems, can I get some peace

If they want to be that way I just let them be 

‘Cause all the same mistakes come when people waste my time

I been playing way too nice 

I been playing way too nice cause

All the same mistakes come when people waste my time 

Ive been playing way too nice, Ive been playing way too nice

Follow my only lead cause I value my peace and my time

Mistake of letting you back in, threw me away with no warning

I lay it out they don’t listen, they speak its never consistent

I walk away and you’ll miss this, cause the truth is

I do my best to keep the scales all balanced should have known 

Not to give in easily

‘Cause I got the aces and I know they know it 

Maybe thats why they try to hurt me 

Never want to get involved in simple minded things

All unnecessary problems, can I get some peace

If they want to be that way I just let them be 

‘Cause all the same mistakes come when people waste my time

I been playing way too nice 

I been playing way too nice cause

All the same mistakes come when people waste my time 

Ive been playing way too nice, Ive been playing way too nice

metadata.name: Nice #1
metadata.title: Nice
